description: Commercial glass display cabinets for offices, lobbies and reception areas. Display awards, trophies and products in these exceptional quality Italian designed and crafted glass display cabinets. Free standing and wall mounted glass display cabinets are available in a range of sizes with lighting, adjustable shelving and storage as required.
name: Display Cabinets
